description: React component 'ChatWindow' responsible for displaying a conversation list and bot typing indicator. It renders messages passed as props and manages auto-scrolling to the latest message.

methods.name: ChatWindow({ messages = [], typing = false })
methods.description: React functional component that displays chat messages and typing indicator, auto-scrolls on updates.

ctags.name: ChatWindow
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ChatWindow({ messages = [], typing = false }) {$/
